com.cleo.lexicom

Class Sync

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cleo.security.encryption.ConfigEncryption
      • com.cleo.lexicom.Sync
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.cleo.clone.LexCloneable, com.cleo.lexicom.product.ISync, com.cleo.security.encryption.IConfigEncryption, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class Sync
extends com.cleo.security.encryption.ConfigEncryption
implements java.lang.Cloneable, com.cleo.clone.LexCloneable, com.cleo.lexicom.product.ISync
    Sync is used in conjunction with Syncer to query synchronization status. Refer to ISyncer.isSynced(String) or ISyncer.isActiveVersalex(String, boolean) or ISyncer.getMasterActiveVersalex(String).
